sense.gloss: final word of an iroha poem
going (up) to the capital, going to Tokyo
returning (home) to Tokyo, returning to the capital
capital (esp. Kyoto, Japan's former capital), seat of government
capital (of music, fashion, etc.), city (e.g. of light)
the northern capital, Kyoto (as opposed to Nara)
style that is fashionable in the capital
former capital region (i.e. Kyoto and its environs)

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓には↑美↑↓うつく↓しい↑都市↑↓とし↓が↑多↑↓おお↓い。↑例↑↓たと↓えば↑京都↑↓きょうと↓、↑奈良↑↓なら↓だ。
sdata.e: Japan is full of beautiful cities. Kyoto and Nara, for instance.
